title: Full stack and web3 developer
description: Working in DEFI (Decentralized finance) startup as full stack developer
rol: Working in company own product. Develop front-end or back-end depending on the project requirements in each moment. I lead and manage a team of 3 developers and I am used to work hand by hand with the CTO to deliver the best code quality we could.

Scrum methodology is used to organise project evolution. I am the main link between the devs team and product owner, design and marketing teams to provide and receive continuous feedback about product iterations, assuring time efficiency for all of us

Some of the hardest issues which I worked against were: Manage real-time communications through WebSocket, massive asynchronous request, responsive styles, manage global application state with Redux and reduce loading time for huge data amount
